segments.text: Acknowledgments play a necessary part in the interview .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Kind acknowledgments can show one's good attainment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We often ignore the acknowledgments in our daily life , and consider them as disposable .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , that's not true . Acknowledgments can help you leave a good impression on others , especially in the public places .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We should particularly pay attention to acknowledgments in the interview .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In the beginning of the interview , it is best that you make acknowledgments for the opportunity of the interview .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't forget to say " Thank you " when you take a seat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Make acknowledgments as well when the interviewer thinks highly of your dressing , experience , or words .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can win a good impression of the interviewer in this way .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Acknowledgments can also help the job-hunters to show their good attainment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Finally , at the end of the interview , make acknowledgments to the interviewer again .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Smiles and kind attitudes are the basics of acknowledgments .
segments.speaker: S2
